name: Piano Dream Tiles: Home Design
description:
Best music games for killing your boring at home full time and tests your hand speed and music tiles rhythm.

A combination of piano game tiles plus home decorating & dress up gameplay brings you an overwhelming fun gaming experience!

Have you ever dreamt of becoming pianist and playing wonderful songs? Have you ever wanted to own luxury rooms and fashionable dresses? Now you can make your dream come true with Piano Dream Tiles! Come design and decorate your dream houses in Piano Dream Tiles! Dress up with trending clothes and make yourself ready to become a famous artist who will confidently join every best Piano Games shows around world!

** Game Features **

- Best quality piano songs with awesome rhythm which are frequently updated: EDM, electronic, pop, rock, blues, classic, band, 8 bit, etc
- New vocal from hot singers are updated daily.
- Awesome furniture in the many rooms for you to design your own dream.
- Hundreds of clothes which you can select for your style.
- Main quest flows story line you can enjoy.
- Visit your friend's home and see how beautiful it is and send challenging request.
- Battle Online helps you beat many players around the world to become top piano game player.
- Many mini games, lucky spin, daily rewards help you complete quest.
- Screenshot your home and share with your friends.

Piano Dream Tiles is a free piano game, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. A network connection is also required.

Go and play this piano game to turn your artist dream into reality!
